alert.note: Alert for Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:58AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Woodruff, Independence, south central Randolph, east central Izard, Jackson, northeastern White, Lawrence and southern Sharp Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1157 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Sidney to near Cave City to near Southside in Independence County to near Pleasant Plains. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Newport... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Cave City... Tuckerman... Diaz... Newark... Swifton... College City... Portia... Grubbs... Pleasant Plains... Strawberry... Lynn... Oil Trough... Jacksonport... Magness... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
